title: minecraft:repairable v1.20.50
description: The repairable item component specifies which items can be used to repair this item, along with how much durability is gained.

repair_items.title: sequence container (class std::vector<struct Puv::v1_20_50::RepairableItemComponent::RepairItemEntry,class std::allocator<struct Puv::v1_20_50::RepairableItemComponent::RepairItemEntry> >)
repair_items.description: List of repair item entries. Each entry needs to define a list of strings for `items` that can be used for the repair and an optional `repair_amount` for how much durability is gained.

items.description: Items that may be used to repair an item.

repair_amount.description: How much the item is repaired.
